觀.definition: Taoist monastery; palace gate watchtower; platform

觀世音.definition: Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)

觀世音菩薩.definition: Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)

觀塘.definition: Kwun Tong district of Kowloon, Hong Kong

觀察.definition: to observe; to watch; to survey

觀後感.definition: impression or feeling after visiting or watching (movies, museums etc)

觀後鏡.definition: mirror showing a view to one's rear (including rearview mirror, side-view mirror, baby view mirror etc)

觀念.definition: notion; thought; concept; sense; views; ideology; general impressions

觀摩.definition: to observe and emulate; to study (esp. following sb's example)

觀望.definition: to wait and see; to watch from the sidelines; to look around; to survey

觀測.definition: to observe; to survey; observation (scientific etc)

觀瀾湖.definition: Mission Hills Group (Chinese hospitality, sports and leisure company)

觀眾.definition: spectators; audience; visitors (to an exhibition etc)

觀落陰.definition: a ritual whereby the living soul is brought to the nether world for a spiritual journey

觀覽.definition: to view; to look at; to look sth over

觀賞.definition: to look at sth with pleasure; to watch (sth marvelous); ornamental

觀釁伺隙.definition: lit. to look for holes, and observe gaps (idiom); fig. to search out one's opponent's weak points; to look for the Achilles' heel

觀音.definition: Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)

觀音菩薩.definition: Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)

觀風.definition: on lookout duty; to serve as lookout

觀點.definition: point of view; viewpoint; standpoint; CL:個|个[ge4]
